reviewText: And with that in mind, it's a spectacular tribute. The video is not crystal clear as we're used to now, but the audio is really great! Glen sounds incredible. A couple of odd song choices, but it's like a sing along from beginning to end. The music is really almost too perfect for a live performance, but still, there it is. If you're going to own one Glen Campbell audio/visual item, this is definitely the one.

Not what I was expecting, but well worth the purchase. If your a (even) a casual fan, there's a good likely hood you will be come a true fan. This cat can sing! ... way beyond country.  Thank you Glen for being a man way beyond your time.

Glen is in great voice here, has a great 70's hairdoo, very good back-up singers, and an excellent full orchestra behind him here. Why the box cover has him with black hair instead his normal blonde hair I don't know. This is/was a great show and is a joy to watch.
Great memories!
Brought back many wonderful memories of listening to Glen growing up and singing his songs.  Rest in peace...
Great
GIFT
Glen Campbell, who rode thru the music of our lives, tells all, the good, the bad and the ugly. Simply, one of the great singers and song writers of our time.
Awesome! Glen Campbell never delivers anything but the best! Good picture and sound.

I always enjoyed Glen's home-town-boy singing, even after he became a celebrity. I must say the Live Anthology dvd brought back so many memories. I thourghly enjoyed watching and listening to some of Glen's original hits. Loved it.
The country music that there ever will be, and by the way those who followed him, didn't know he could play the guitar & piano.
So many of his songs. A beautiful trip down memory lane with a fabulous artist!
I am very happy with the CD and DVD.

Anytime you can find live footage of Glen Campbell performing, get it. The sound and video are acceptable. I am glad I purchased the DVD. Wondering if the GLEN CAMPBELL GOODTIME HOUR series will ever be available. I would buy the complete series.

Not a great lover of country music but this DVD proves that Glen was truly a great performer singer and guitarist I especially like all the Jimmy Webb penned classics and Southern Nights by Mister Allen Toussaint. Highly recommended.
A live dvd
Great concert and Good Time Hour selections spanning his wonderful career.  Very cool to see the 70's sets and attire - even as a baby boomer I didn't remember styles being that outlandish.

Glen Campbell was a fantastic live performer and this DVD/CD combo is excellent.  The DVD contains 23 concert performances plus a ton of bonus features:  19 videos of duets from the Glen Campbell Goodtime Hour with people such as Jimmy Webb, Helen Reddy, Seals and Crofts, David Gates, 8 videos of instrumentals featuring Glen's fantastic guitar playing, and 3 bonus performances.  Plus a 22 song CD of Glen in concert in 1990  Quality of the DVD is great considering that some of these are from the mid 1970s.  The concert CD is excellent. If you're a Glen Campbell fan you need this!
what a great singer
